clearcontrol.devices.stages

Class StageDeviceBase

  • java.lang.Object
    • clearcontrol.core.device.name.NameableBase
      • clearcontrol.core.device.NameableWithChangeListener<VirtualDevice>
        • clearcontrol.core.device.VirtualDevice
          • clearcontrol.devices.stages.StageDeviceBase
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    WaitingInterface, HasChangeListenerInterface<VirtualDevice>, NameableInterface, ReadOnlyNameableInterface, OpenCloseDeviceInterface, StageDeviceInterface
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ECC100StageDevice, StageDeviceSimulator, TSTStageDevice

    public abstract class StageDeviceBase
extends VirtualDevice
implements StageDeviceInterface, WaitingInterface
    Base class providing common fields and methods for all stage device interface implementations
    Author:
    royer

        public Variable<java.lang.Double> getGranularityPositionVariable(int pDOFIndex)
        Description copied from interface: StageDeviceInterface
        Returns the granularity variable for a given DOF. The granularity is the step size. If there is no step size defined, the value is zero.
        Specified by:

      • getEnableVariable

        public Variable<java.lang.Boolean> getEnableVariable(int pIndex)
        Description copied from interface: StageDeviceInterface
        Returns enable variable for a given DOF's index. When enabled, a DOF is allowed to move when the target position is changed.
        Specified by:
        getEnableVariable in interface StageDeviceInterface
        Parameters:
        pIndex - DOF's index
        Returns:
        enable variable

      • getReadyVariable

        public Variable<java.lang.Boolean> getReadyVariable(int pIndex)
        Description copied from interface: StageDeviceInterface
        Returns the ready variable for a given DOF's index. The 'ready' variable informs on whether the stage is ready to accept new commands, either a new target position or a homing command.
        Specified by:
        getReadyVariable in interface StageDeviceInterface
        Parameters:
        pIndex - DOF's index
        Returns:
        ready variable

      • getHomingVariable

        public Variable<java.lang.Boolean> getHomingVariable(int pIndex)
        Description copied from interface: StageDeviceInterface
        Returns the homing variable for a given DOF's index. When this variable receives an edge from false to true, the homing procedure for this DOF is started. The 'ready' variable must be checked since the stage will not respond to commands unless it is ready.
        Specified by:
        getHomingVariable in interface StageDeviceInterface
        Parameters:
        pIndex - DOF's index
        Returns:
        homing variable

      • getStopVariable

        public Variable<java.lang.Boolean> getStopVariable(int pIndex)
        Description copied from interface: StageDeviceInterface
        Returns the stop variable for a given DOF's index. Stops all movement on the stage's DOF.
        Specified by:
        getStopVariable in interface StageDeviceInterface
        Parameters:
        pIndex - DOF's index
        Returns:
        stop variable

      • getResetVariable

        public Variable<java.lang.Boolean> getResetVariable(int pIndex)
        Description copied from interface: StageDeviceInterface
        Returns the reset variable for a given DOF's index. Resets the controller into the a state equivalent to the power-on state (as if the DOFs controller had been power cycled.)
        Specified by:
        getResetVariable in interface StageDeviceInterface
        Returns:
        reset variable
